body.p: Whereas It has been represented to me that William B. Keas of Clark County Kentucky was murdered at his residence in the night time on the 25th day of November 1864 by Some unknown person or persons under aggravated circumstances I therefore request ^that^ his Excellency the Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky offer such reward as ^he^ may be authorized by law in such cases made and provided Given under my hand this 6th of January 18645

W C Goodloe
Judge 15th Jud Dist Ky

Clarke County
$300. Reward each. for the unknown Murderers of Wm B. Keas
6th Jany/65
